name: CPR Decision Response
description: A vocabulary of SNOMED codes that describes whether someone has made the decision whether cardio-pulmonary resuscitation should commence.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.display: Not aware of do not attempt cardiopulmonary resuscitation clinical decision (finding)
